languages.text: Времена жестокости и буйства Каллигоса подошли к концу, и лишь тогда устрашенные свидетели поведали о множестве жутких преступлений, совершенных им. Память о годах, в которых протекторат Винтерскейлов процветал под мудрым правлением Каллигоса, сменилась воспоминаниями о бесчисленных и кровавых злодеяниях, сотворенных им в последние годы.

The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.
languages.original_text: Времена жестокости и буйства Каллигоса подошли к концу, и лишь тогда устрашенные свидетели поведали о множестве жутких преступлений, совершенных им. Память о годах, в которых протекторат Винтерскейлов процветал под мудрым правлением Каллигоса, сменилась воспоминаниями о бесчисленных и кровавых злодеяниях, сотворенных им в последние годы.

traits.locale_text: Times of cruelty and wrath of Calligos came to an end. Only after that, many intimidated witnesses of his vile crimes stepped forward to recount them. The memory of good years of prosperity for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale gave way to the memory of innumerable and bloody crimes that he conducted in the past years.

Times of cruelty and wrath of Calligos came to an end. Only after that, many intimidated witnesses of his vile crimes stepped forward to recount them. The memory of good years of prosperity for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale gave way to the memory of innumerable and bloody crimes that he conducted in the past years.

The cruelty and wrath of Calligos came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses of his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

The cruelty and wrath of Calligos came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses of his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

languages.text: 卡里戈斯残忍与愤怒的统治结束了。在那之后，众多目睹了他邪恶罪行的目击者终于鼓起勇气，颤颤巍巍地走出来，陈述事实。曾几何时，这个王朝在卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的英明统治下繁荣昌盛。而如今，他犯下的无数血腥罪行让那段美好的岁月黯然失色。
languages.original_text: The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

traits.locale_text: 卡里戈斯的残忍与愤怒终于结束了。在那之后，众多目睹了他邪恶罪行的目击者终于鼓起勇气，颤颤巍巍地走出来，陈述事实。曾几何时，这个王朝在卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的英明统治下繁荣昌盛。而如今，他犯下的无数血腥罪行让那段美好的岁月黯然失色。

languages.text: Calligos Ära der Grausamkeit und des Zorns nahm ein Ende. Erst da wagten es die vielen verängstigten Zeugen seiner schändlichen Verbrechen, darüber zu berichten. Erinnerungen an die guten, wohlhabenden Jahre des Protektorats unter der weisen Herrschaft von Calligos Winterzunder wurden von dem Vermächtnis seiner unzähligen und blutigen Verbrechen zerschlagen.
languages.original_text: The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

traits.locale_text: Die Grausamkeit und der Zorn des Calligos nahmen ein Ende. Erst da wagten es die vielen verängstigten Zeugen seiner schändlichen Verbrechen, darüber zu berichten. Erinnerungen an die guten, wohlhabenden Jahre des Protektorats unter der weisen Herrschaft von Calligos Winterzunder wurden von dem Vermächtnis seiner unzähligen und blutigen Verbrechen zerschlagen.

languages.text: La cruauté et la colère de Calligos s'éteignirent avec lui. Les nombreux témoins terrifiés de ses crimes odieux sortirent enfin de l'ombre pour raconter ce qu'ils avaient vécu. Le souvenir des années fastes du protectorat sous le règne avisé de Calligos Winterscale fut éclipsé par les conséquences de ses innombrables crimes sanglants.
languages.original_text: The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

traits.locale_text: La cruauté et la colère de Calligos s’éteignirent avec lui. Les nombreux témoins terrifiés de ses crimes odieux sortirent enfin de l'ombre pour raconter ce qu’ils avaient vécu. Le souvenir des années fastes du protectorat sous le règne avisé de Calligos Winterscale fut éclipsé par les conséquences de ses innombrables crimes sanglants.

languages.text: La era de la crueldad y la ira de Calligos llegó a su fin, y solo entonces los numerosos testigos de sus viles crímenes se atrevieron a hablar de ellos. Los recuerdos de los años buenos y prósperos del protectorado bajo el sabio liderazgo de Calligos Winterscale quedaron eclipsados por el legado de sus innumerables crímenes cruentos.
languages.original_text: The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

traits.locale_text: La crueldad y la ira de Calligos llegaron a su fin, y solo entonces los numerosos testigos de sus viles crímenes se atrevieron a hablar de ellos. Los recuerdos de los años buenos y prósperos del protectorado bajo el sabio liderazgo de Calligos Winterscale quedaron eclipsados por el legado de sus innumerables crímenes cruentos.

languages.text: カリゴスの残忍さと怒りの時代は終わりを告げた。その時になって初めて、彼の卑劣な犯罪の恐怖に怯えていた多くの目撃者たちが、証言を口にするために公の場に進み出た。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの賢明な統治の下、保護領が繁栄したという良き時代の記憶は、彼の無数の血なまぐさい犯罪の遺産に取って代わられた。
languages.original_text: The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

traits.locale_text: カリゴスの残忍さと怒りの時代は終わりを告げた。その時になって初めて、彼の卑劣な犯罪の恐怖に怯えていた多くの目撃者たちが、証言を口にするために公の場に進み出た。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの賢明な統治の下、保護領が繁栄したという良き時代の記憶は、彼の無数の血なまぐさい犯罪の遺産に取って代わられた。

languages.text: Calligos'un zalimlik ve öfke dönemi, geçmişte kaldı. Onun gaddarca suçlarına şahit olan nice korkmuş tanık da bu sayede ileri çıkarak olanları anlatacak cesareti buldu. Calligos Winterscale'in bilge hükümdarlığında geçirilen, refah içindeki güzel protektora yıllarının üzerine, eli kanlı Hür Tacir'in sayısız suçunun gölgesi düştü.
languages.original_text: The era of Calligos's cruelty and wrath came to an end. Only then did the many terrified witnesses to his vile crimes step forward to recount them. Memories of the good, prosperous years for the protectorate under the wise rule of Calligos Winterscale were eclipsed by the legacy of his innumerable and bloody crimes.

traits.locale_text: Calligos'un zalimlik ve öfke dönemi geçmişte kaldı. Onun gaddarca suçlarına şahit olan nice korkmuş tanık da bu sayede ileri çıkarak olanları anlatacak cesareti kendisinde buldu. Protektorada Calligos Winterscale'in bilge hükümdarlığı sırasında geçirilen, refah içindeki güzel yılların üzerine, eli kanlı Hür Tacir'in sayısız suçunun gölgesi düştü.
